content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?

Substitute this with a frontend component for the staking contract at 0x0744d79f3e8f0a3652d886c9c49cb476a05de248 on polygon. It requires users to have TestToken to approve amount before staking. The TestToken address is 0x2c87f28573824f65f75c8a0437f444605214ae41

function.arguments: {"component_id": "Hero1734540647", "sc_address": "0x0744d79f3e8f0a3652d886c9c49cb476a05de248", "chain_id": "POLYGON", "change_description": "Substitute with a staking contract frontend that requires users to have TestToken to approve the amount before staking. TestToken address is 0x2c87f28573824f65f75c8a0437f444605214ae41", "acknowledgement_message": "Alright, substituting the component for the staking contract frontend with approval requirement for TestToken."}
function.name: EditSmartContractFrontendComponent

content: Alright, substituting the component for the staking contract frontend with approval requirement for TestToken.
